main event: A civilian sighting of a large, brightly lit object in West Galveston Bay for about 60 minutes on July 5-6, 1966.
interesting points: The object exhibited no sound and had no visible trail or exhaust., It appeared to wash out nearby stars, creating a dome-like effect around it., A smaller companion object appeared intermittently, emitting a flashing light., The observation took place under clear skies with thin scattered clouds., The sighting was reported to the authorities, leading to further investigation by Project Blue Book.
